name: CaseLaw
0:
”Alexa, open Case Law”
”Alexa, ask Case Law for a fact”
”Alexa, tell Case Law to tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: case law
des:
Ask for a Case Law.

This skill will answer you with a random case taken from all official, book-published United States case law.
All data are taken from CAP (Caselaw Access Project), a public project of Harvard University.

To start, just say "Alexa, open Case Law" or "Alexa, ask case law for a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
